title: zpoiler: TRAILER FOR NEW CHAMPION
body:
Hi guyz, a new champ gonna be releazed zoon. Hiz name iz Tamm, King of the Rivers

If  anyone noticed a ztrange laughter while playing zummonerz rift, itz laughter of the champ. 

Ill give u guyz a link for the video :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9RM4HwwoKs&feature=youtu.be

from NA lol newz

replies.body: by the look of it he will be a tank coz of how big he looks and will have a passive like {{champion:429}}   because of the start and end you let me in he sed so im thinking along those lines
